HRQoL and utilities SLR PRISMA. *“Note that a “report” could be a journal article, preprint, conference abstract, study register entry, clinical study report, dissertation, unpublished manuscript, government report or any other document providing relevant information”: https://www.bmj.com/content/372/bmj.n71.
